title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Redefine Breaking and Entering in New Mansion Raid
content:
Flex your combat skills in one of Los Santos' bougiest zip codes in Mansion Raid.

Use heavy-duty weaponry and explosives to infiltrate a luxury property and make a multi-stage descent to the basement vault to extract the gold — or fend off the would-be infiltrators as the mansion’s defenders in this high-octane Adversary Mode.

This week’s explosive new mode brings danger to your doorstep and close-range combat to the Featured Series, with 2X GTA$ and RP awarded during its premiere week.
